name: Nihon Yakyuu Kikou Shounin: Batting Revolution
overview: In Nihon Yakyuu Kikou Shounin: Batting Revolution (バッティング レボリューション) get up off the couch, take your favorite bat - also known as a Wii remote - and settle in the batter's box, because it's time to hit your best shots! The training machine will use all its tricks to test your skills: fast balls, sliders, simple and complex curves, and even knucleballs!
